methods.name: add
methods.description: Add block at the end of collection

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Check if block exists in collection

methods.name: insertAfter
methods.description: Insert block into collection after given block, returns true if block was inserted

methods.name: insertBefore
methods.description: Insert block into collection before given block, returns true if block was inserted

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes block from the collection, returns true if block was removed
